title: Earlier today I got cat-called
body:
So I got home, right? My phone goes off and the caller ID shows it's my manager. I am not entirely happy about this (see: "I literally just got home"). I answer anyway and there is some weird static. I can't get my manager to answer me and I start to worry.

So I text her instead.

Her cat was fucking sitting on her phone and butt-dialed me. The 'Static' I heard was him purring.

This is the only kind of cat-call that's acceptable though.
